comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: A-20G serial 42-54122 started combat life with the 89th Bomb Squadron, 3rd BG. She was transferred to the 389th Bomb Squadron, 312th BG (where she received the squadron's "spade" insignia on the empennage). She ended her career with the 417th Bomb Group - seen here - having served with all three 5th Air Force "Havoc" units.
